questions.question: Do you frequently have trouble staying focused on tasks or conversations?
Do you often feel restless, fidgety, or unable to sit still for long periods?
Do you frequently forget appointments, lose important items, or struggle with organization?
Do you have difficulty completing projects, even when you start with enthusiasm?
Do you act impulsively, interrupt conversations, or struggle with self-control?

score_ranges.message: Low likelihood of ADHD. Your attention and activity levels appear typical.
Moderate ADHD symptoms. You may experience some difficulties with focus and self-control.
High likelihood of ADHD. Your symptoms indicate significant attention-related challenges. Seeking professional evaluation is advised.
